wld.client.only_for_server: This mod is only for server, please do NOT install it for your Minecraft client.
wld.client.auto_allow_all: Allow-all mode have been automatically enabled, or you will not be able to join the single player world. If it doesn't matter you can set 'disableClientCheck' to true in config.json and restart your client.
wld.console.disable_whitelist: %s disabled whitelist temporarily, vanilla whitelist is taking effect
wld.console.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred while executing command
wld.console.invalid_storage_args_length: Invalid storage args length, this may cause problems.
wld.console.record_remove_manually_hint: You need to remove '%s' manually or it may cause unexpected problems
